lead_paragraph: SAVITS--Ruth. Beloved wife of Irving Savits, z'l, mother of Cheri and Carol, mother in law of Steven and Robert and grandmother of Mark, Danny, Jenny, Andrea and Toby, died peacefully on March 31,2016. We will always remember Ruthie as a selfless soul and the heart of our family. She taught us to focus, as she did, on the best that life has to offer. Funeral will be held on 1:00pm Sunday April 3, 2016 at Ohev Shalom Synagogue, 2 Chester Road, Wallingford, Pennsylvania 19086. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to support The Friedman Brain Institute. Please make checks payable to the Mount Sinai Health System and include "In memory of Ruth Savits" on your check or online gift. By mail, Office of Development, Mount Sinai Health System, One Gustave L. Levy Place, Box 1049, New York, NY 10029. Credit card donations can be made by phone at: 212-659-8500. 1/3
